dc_description_s: The Community Arts Grant (CAG) provides support for small-scale projects to promote arts and humanities activities to a diverse range of communities in the District of Columbia. For DCCAH This grant program gives the applicant the opportunity to expand on its own definition of community.The DC Commission on the Arts and Humanities recognizes the importance of remaining relevant in a city of competitive opportunities for residents who have at their disposal significant discretionary income for arts and cultural offerings. Further1 billion in economic activity is generated annually by the non-profit arts and culture industry in Washington Additionally These trends create an opportunity for DCCAH to position itself at the forefront of the city s cultural planning. To achieve this goal
